headlines.description: Sadio Mane and Roberto Firmino scored as Liverpool won their first four Premier League games for the first time by beating Leicester City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mane, Firmino lift Liverpool past Leicester

headlines.description: Glenn Murray scored twice as Brighton & Hove Albion came back from two goals down to draw 2-2 with Fulham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Murray sparks Brighton comeback vs. Fulham

headlines.description: Chelsea stretched their perfect Premier League start to four games after goals from Pedro and Eden Hazard gave them a 2-0 win vs. Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea still perfect with win vs. Bournemouth

headlines.description: Southampton earned their first win of the Premier League season with a 2-0 victory at Crystal Palace on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton get first win, defeat Palace

headlines.description: Everton gave a Premier League debut to Lucas Digne, who marked the occasion with an assist in a 1-1 draw against Huddersfield Town.
headlines.shortLinkText: Digne debuts with assist in Everton draw

events.name: Wolverhampton Wanderers at West Ham United

headlines.description: Adama Traore struck in stoppage time for Wolves as they beat bottom team West Ham to pile the pressure on Manuel Pellegrini's side.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham remain pointless as Wolves win

headlines.description: Raheem Sterling and Kyle Walker each scored as Manchester City defeated Newcastle United 2-1 at the Etihad Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sterling, Walker fire City past Newcastle
